name: Wetware
description:
Hack an AI to Win a War


Enter a world where advanced AI live amongst humans, and play as a Drone Whisperer - a specialist in data extraction from hostile AIs. In a dragged-out war against a rival nation, the Army has captured an enemy drone rife with intel that can help turn the tide to your side. It is your job to extract this information from the drone. The fate of a nation depends on you.

Stop-motion style world


Characters and objects in Wetware are lovingly crafted and animated to resemble stop-motion animation, making a unique art style.

Unstructured Play


In Wetware, events and plots advance by time. You can do anything in any order you want within a day, but you only have several days to make an impact, so make it count!

Engaging Choices


There is more than one outcome to work towards, and there are multiple ways to work towards them. Without spoiling too much, be prepared to make some tough choices throughout the story.
